comment_1: Just so you guys know, the chorus is adapted from The Cardigans' "Love Fool".
comment_2: Have any of you thought that when he says "oh how you do me" that maybe it means do me as in do my head in? Like, make me crazy? After all he does hang out with "gangsters" and they use a lot of slang.
comment_3:
just to say, the "oh how you do me" bit isn't from the cardigans' lovefool. the lovefool lyrics go:

Love me, love me
Say that you love me
Fool me, fool me
Go on and fool me

so, no idea where that comes from or what it implies. great song though.
